level.heading: Denial, suspension, or revocation of pharmacist's license or pharmacy intern's registration.
Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-99, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-2885.02.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Subsequent to the repeal of this section, D.C. Law 19-171 enacted into law Part C of subchapter IV of Chapter 28 of Title 47.
